Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: ஞாலம் கருதினுங் கைகூடுங் காலங் கருதி இடத்தாற் செயின்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Though (a man) should meditate (the conquest of) the world, he may accomplish it if he acts in the right time, and at the right place.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A visionary leader stands on a hill, looking at a miniature, glowing globe of the world ('ஞாலம்') floating before them. They are contemplating its conquest.
Layered_Composition.Midground: The leader is not acting rashly. They are observing a complex celestial map spread before them, waiting for a specific alignment of stars (the right time - 'காலம் கருதி') and pointing to a strategic location on a terrestrial map (the right place - 'இடத்தாற்').
Layered_Composition.Background: As the celestial and terrestrial maps align, the glowing globe of the world willingly and gently floats into the leader's outstretched hands, signifying that their grand ambition is accomplished ('கைகூடும்').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Even the grandest ambition, such as conquering the world, can be achieved if one acts at the perfect time and in the most strategic place.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The celestial map represents 'time'. The terrestrial map represents 'place'. The glowing globe floating into the hands symbolizes effortless achievement when the conditions are right.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Strategic, epic, visionary, patient, inevitable success.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A cosmic, magical light illuminates the scene. The maps and the globe glow with an ethereal light. The palette is deep and full of cosmic blues, purples, and golds.

Technical_Cues.Camera: An epic, wide shot that captures the visionary leader, the maps, and the globe against a cosmic backdrop.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Magical, otherworldly lighting that befits the epic scale of the ambition.

Negative_Prompt: leader failing, globe flying away, text on maps, cartoonish.

Hyperparameters.seed: Explore variations for the design of the celestial map.
